RBBT12.title: The Small Assassin
RBBT12.path: ../Ray Bradbury Theater/Ray Bradbury Theater - 12 The Small Assassin.m4v
RBBT12.description: A terrified new mother is convinced that her infant son is somehow trying to kill her but naturally nobody believes her.

LISP48.title: Mutiny in Space
LISP48.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost in Space - 48 Mutiny in Space.m4v
LISP48.description: A space pirate looking for his crew that mutinied finds Will and Dr. Smith trying to repair his empty ship.

MSTK0110.title: Robot Holocaust
MSTK0110.description: When the ninth chapter of Radar Men from the Moon (1952) encounters technical difficulties, it gives the Mads an earlier opportunity to bring the Satellite of Love and its crew to their knees via Robot Holocaust (1987).

SPRA19.title: Girl Daredevil (part 2)
SPRA19.description: Brotch and his cronies imprison Speed and Twinke in a cave and head off to their Mt Rushmore lair. But it doesn't take long before the two escape and a major fight breaks out.

LISP47.title: The Toymaker
LISP47.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost in Space - 47 The Toymaker.m4v
LISP47.description: Smith and Will find a toymaker's world inside an alien merchandise-ordering machine.

DRHI10.title: New York City
DRHI10.description: The U.S. reluctantly accepts the Statue of Liberty, Sybil Ludington goes on an epic ride to warn of a British attack, and journalist Nellie Bly infiltrates a corrupt mental institution.

SPRA20.title: The Fastest Car on Earth (part 1)
SPRA20.path: ../Speed Racer/Speed Racer - 20 The Fastest Car on Earth (part 1).mp4
SPRA20.description: Pops is horrified at the return of the GRX, a supernaturally powerful engine that has ended up killing or harming every one of its drivers.

LITB049.title: Wally's New Suit
LITB049.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 049 Wally's New Suit.mp4
LITB049.description: June cleverly rescues Wally from bad taste after he is goaded by Eddie Haskell into buying a new suit for an upcoming school dance without his parents' help.

RT66019.title: An Absence of Tears
RT66019.description: DAMAGED, SHORT. Still in the Los Angeles area with Tod struggling over his computer class at UCLA and Buz enjoying the "sights", a beautiful blond woman enters their lives. She was recently married and almost immediately widowed. The lady will stop at nothing to find the men who killed her husband-despite being blind.

TREK20.title: Court Martial
TREK20.description: Kirk draws a court martial in the negligent death of a crewman.

LISP46.title: The Questing Beast
LISP46.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost in Space - 46 The Questing Beast.m4v
LISP46.description: A space knight is following the questing beast who Penny becomes friends with.

OFUK10.title: Motivation
OFUK10.description: David's attempt at being cool includes sporting an earring. His session as a trainer arrives but his unique approach doesn't work very well.

ACGS10.path: ../All Creatures Great and Small/All Creatures Great and Small - 10 We Can But Hope.m4v
ACGS10.title: We Can But Hope

LITB048.title: The Pipe
LITB048.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 048 The Pipe.mp4
LITB048.description: Wally gets blamed after Beaver takes pal Larry Mondello's dare to smoke the new Meerschaum pipe that Fred Rutherford sent as a gift to Ward from Germany.

PATV09.title: The Horse Race
PATV09.path: ../Planet Of The Apes (Television)/Planet Of The Apes TV 09.mp4
PATV09.description: Virdon agrees to race a chimpanzee Prefect's horse against Urkos best horse, in exchange for a condemned boy's freedom. Urko has never lost a race, but of course, as Virdon finds out, Urko doesn't play fair. Despite Urko's treachery and cheating, Virdon prevails in the end.

CADF11.title: The Holy Thief
CADF11.description: Ramsey Abbey in Cambridgeshire puts in a claim for the remains of St. Winifred, whose reliquary is the object of prayer and lucrative donations to Shrewsbury Abbey.

MWAM1929.path: ../Birth of Cinema/Man With a Movie Camera (1929).mp4
MWAM1929.title: Man with a Movie Camera
MWAM1929.description: Experimental Ukrainian Soviet documentary famous for the range of cinematic techniques Vertov (director) invented or employed, such as multiple exposure, fast & slow motion, freeze frames, match cuts, jump cuts, split screens, etc. From dawn to dusk Soviet citizens are shown at work and at play, and interacting with the machinery of modern life. Silent.

BSG110.title: The Living Legend (part 2)
BSG110.path: ../Battlestar Galactica TOS/Battlestar Galactica 11 - The Living Legend (part 2).m4v
BSG110.description: After Baltar's attack is repulsed, the crews of the Galactica and Pegasus carry out an attack on the planet Gamoray to acquire fuel supplies.

AQWF1930.title: All Quiet on the Western Front
AQWF1930.description: A landmark for its vivid depiction of the tragedy of World War I from a German soldierâ€™s point of view, for its technically inventive, spectacular battle scenes (at the dawn of sound in film), and for its prescient denunciation of fanatic nationalism and militarism.

LRSS10.title: Party
LRSS10.path: ../Larry Sanders Show, The/Larry Sanders Show, The - 10 The Party.m4v
LRSS10.description: An innocent invitation to Arthur and his wife for dinner turns into a full-blown staff party

SOKO10.title: The Transformed Humans
SOKO10.description: Dr. Over makes Ligon swallow a train near Lake Biwa to kidnap Suzuki, one of the passengers and head of the Kyoto Branch of Unicorn Organization.

LITB047.title: The Shave
LITB047.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 047 The Shave.mp4

TPOD12.title: France: October, 2089 AD
TPOD12.description: Escaping many dangers since the vineyard, the boys finally come within sight of The White Mountains.

CON110.title: Yesterday, Tomorrow and You
CON110.description: Burke ties together the modern inventions in which previous episodes had culminated: telecommunications, the computer, the jet engine, plastics, rockets, television, the production line, and the atomic bomb.

ICLD10.title: Hail Who?
ICLD10.description: Caligula has not only made his horse a senator but has turned the palace into a brothel, selling off senators and their wives for sex.

LITB046.title: Beaver's Ring
LITB046.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 046 Beaver's Ring.mp4
LITB046.description: A letter from Beaver's godmother, June's Aunt Martha, brings the young man an heirloom ring once belonging to Beaver's namesake, his great-uncle Theodore. But his parents forbid him to wear it to school because losing it would terribly upset his great-aunt and Beaver's troubles begin after his clever plan to show the ring to his school pals without actually "wearing" it there is derailed by creepy Judy Hensler.

FWLT10.title: The Kipper and the Corpse
FWLT10.path: ../Fawlty Towers/Fawlty Towers - 10 The Kipper and the Corpse.mp4
FWLT10.description: One of the guests has died in his sleep, but Basil thinks it's due to serving him spoiled food.

LITB050.title: School Play
LITB050.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 050 School Play.mp4
LITB050.description: Beaver is excited to be cast as the canary, the lead character in his school play, until Ward's "pep" talk gives him stage fright.

RT66020.title: Like a Motherless Child
RT66020.description: Tod and Buz, driving through Nevada, pick up an orphan hitchhiking. Tod insists he be returned to the orphanage. Buz, both unhappy and angry, separates from Tod. On his own now, Buz looks to fill his loneliness and meets a motherly lady. He finds her sad life includes alcoholism over regret for a long lost son.

7787AD9B.path: ../Kaiju (Giant Monsters)/Gamera vs. Monster X (Gamera vs. Jiger, 1970, dubbed).m4v
7787AD9B.title: Gamera vs. Monster X (Gamera vs. Jiger, 1970, dubbed)

FETM09.title: For Miles and Miles
FETM09.path: ../From the Earth to the Moon/From the Earth to the Moon - 9 For Miles And Miles.m4v
FETM09.description: Ten years after becoming the first American in space Alan Shepard battles back from health problems to command the Apollo 14 mission.

ULTR19.title: Demons Rise Again
ULTR19.description: An object that is unearthed at a construction site is initially believed to be a time capsule. Further investigation reveals that it is a prison for two dangerous monsters.

ULTR20.title: Terror on Route 87
ULTR20.description: A dragon statue that was designed by a boy comes to life when the boy is killed by a car. The dragon's mission is to protect children from the dangers of automobiles.

STAN10.title: Mudd's Passion
STAN10.path: ../Star Trek Animated Series/Star Trek Animated Series - 10 Mudd's Passion.m4v
STAN10.description: The Enterprise crew once again runs afoul of the incorrigible Harry Mudd, this time hawking a love potion that greatly influences Spock and the crew.
